scenario: A young girl asking how to take care of her mental and emotional well-being
instruction: Ni ibiki byo kwikora nshobora gukora mu buriri kugira ngo nduhuke?
output: Mu buriri, shaka umwanya wo gusoma igitabo, gutega amatwi umuziki woroshye, cyangwa kwandika ibyo wize mu gitabo. Irinde gufata telefone cyangwa 'tablet' mu buriri. Ibyo bizagufasha kuruhuka neza, kandi bikurinde ibyiyumviro by'ibibi.

scenario: A young girl experiencing bullying at school or online
instruction: Umuntu arimo kunsetsa ku ishuri, kandi simenya icyo gukora. Nagira nte ngo nihangane?
output: Niba bakina ku mubiri wawe cyangwa bakwangiza, irinde kumva ugira uburakari. Menya ko atari ikosa ryawe, kandi ko ari bo bafite ikibazo. Bwira umuntu mukuru ako kanya. Kwirinda ni byiza kuruta kwishora mu ntonganya.

scenario: A young girl feeling isolated and disconnected from others
instruction: Nihumva ndi wenyine, byandenze. Hari uburyo bwo gukira?
output: Shaka umuntu, nka inshuti ya hafi, umuryango, cyangwa umujyanama wo kuganira. Jya ugera aho abantu babarirwa. Menya ko abandi nabo banyura muri ibyo. Kwiyizera bizagufasha kubona inshuti nshya.

scenario: A young girl having difficulty expressing her feelings and needs
instruction: Kuvugisha inshuti zanjye birangora. Nagira nte ngo mbe mushya mu mvugo?
output: Menya ibyo ushaka kuvuga, wivuge buhoro kandi mu mvugo igaragara. Shakisha abantu uzagiraho inshuti. Niba bigoye, andika ibyiyumviro byawe, hanyuma ubihe umuntu wizeye. Uko ugenda uganira ni ko ugenda uba mushya.

scenario: A young girl who has experienced a traumatic event and needs support
instruction: Kuba mwaranyuze mu kibazo gikomeye, ese mfite umutekano? Hari icyo nshobora gukora kugira ngo ntekereze ibyiza?
output: Yego, ufite umutekano. Wemerere umutima wawe kurohuka. Gerageza gukora ibyo usanzwe ukunda gukora, kandi ushakishe ubufasha bw'umujyanama. Wibuke ko igihe kirekire kizagufasha gukira. Kwita ku buzima bwawe ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking how to become stronger and bounce back from difficulties
instruction: Ni iki nshobora gukora kugira ngo ntekereze ibyiza mu bibazo bikomeye?
output: Gerageza kumenya ko ibibazo bizashira. Shakisha ibyiza mu buzima bwawe, kandi wibande ku ngaruka zawe nziza. Kwizera no gukora siporo byoroshye birafasha. Kwigira imbaraga bizagufasha kumenya guhangana n'ibibazo.

scenario: A young girl asking about her first period, what to expect, and how to manage it
instruction: Igihe cy'ukwezi cyanjye ntikimara iminsi imwe buri kwezi. Ese ndi murwayi?
output: Igihe cy'ukwezi (imihango) cy'umukobwa ntabwo buri gihe kiba kimara iminsi imwe cyangwa kigera ku gihe kimwe buri kwezi. Ni ibisanzwe, cyane cyane mu gihe cy'ubukumi. Ariko niba bikubaho igihe kinini cyane, cyangwa amaraso aba menshi cyane, ni byiza kuganira n'umuganga. Kutagerageza kubara umubare w'iminsi.

scenario: A young girl asking about how her body changes during puberty
instruction: Ni izihe ndwara z'imyororokere nkwiriye kwirinda cyangwa kumenya?
output: Ni byiza kumenya ku bijyanye n'indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina, nka SIDA (HIV) n'izindi. Kwirinda ni ingenzi: kuganira n'ababyeyi, kwirinda ubusambanyi, no kumenya uko wirinda. Niba ufite impungenge, vugana n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl confused about physical changes happening to her body
instruction: Amabere yanjye ntabwo angana, rimwe riruta irindi. Ese ni ibintu bibi?
output: Oya, ni ibisanzwe rwose! Amabere y'abakobwa benshi ntabwo angana neza mu gihe cyo gukura. Ibi bishobora kuguma uko bihora, kandi nta kibazo gihari. Niba ufite ububabare, vugana n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl asking about proper hygiene practices during her period
instruction: Ese ni byiza gukoresha imiti y'umubiri ku gitsina mu gihe cy'imihango?
output: Oya, si byiza gukoresha imiti y'umubiri (perfumes/sprays) ku gitsina, kabone niyo waba uri mu gihe cy'imihango. Iyo miti ishobora kuguha uburozi. Gukoresha amazi meza n'isabune gusa birahagije. Kwirinda ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking what consent means and how to recognize it
instruction: Niba mbanje kwemeranya, nshobora guhindura ibyemezo byanjye? ese ndashobora kuvuga 'Oya' nyuma?
output: Yego, ubwemeranye bugomba kuba bushobora guhagarara igihe icyo aricyo cyose. Niba wemeye gukora ikintu, ariko nyuma ukumva udashaka, ufite uburenganzira bwo kuvuga 'Oya.' 'Oya' iba 'Oya' rwose. Ni uburenganzira bwawe bwo kwiyemeza.

scenario: A young girl asking about what makes a healthy relationship with peers
instruction: Ni iki nshobora gukora kugira ngo nige kubwizwa ukuri mu mubano w'inshuti?
output: Ukwizera n'ukuri ni ingenzi. Vuga ibyiyumviro byawe mu buryo bwiza kandi bwubaka, kandi utegereze ko n'abandi bakubwiza ukuri. Iyo umuntu ahisha byinshi, uwo si umubano mwiza. Kwizera bizagufasha mu mubano.

scenario: A young girl asking how to identify safe places and people
instruction: Nshaka kumenya uburyo bwo gukemura ikibazo kiri mu rugo. Ahantu hizewe ni he nabiganiriraho?
output: Ahantu hizewe ni ahantu wumva uri wenyine, kandi abantu ntibaguteye ubwoba. Ushobora kujya ahantu hari umuyobozi w'itorero, umujyanama w'ishuri, cyangwa se urugo rwa mugenzi wawe wizeye. Kwita ku mutekano wawe ni ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Ndi gutinya cyane ibizamini, kandi ndumva mbifitiye ubwoba. Ni ubuhe buryo bwo gukemura ubwo bwoba?
output: Ubwo bwoba ni ibisanzwe. Jya ugerageza guhumeka cyane mbere yo gutangira ikizami. Jya wita ku gutegura ibizamini neza, kandi wige kumenya ko ibyo byakubayeho bikubera intambwe yo gukura. Niba ubwoba bukabije, jya uganira n'umujyanama w'ishuri.

scenario: A young girl feeling sad, hopeless, and losing interest in activities she used to enjoy
instruction: Ndi kumva agahinda gakabije, sinishimye. Nakora iki ngo mpindure imyumvire yanjye?
output: Agahinda gakabije birashobora kugutera gucika intege, ariko wibuke ko ushoboye. Jya ushaka umuntu wizeye cyangwa se undi muntu mukuru ushobora kuganira na we. Jya ukora ibintu byiza, nko kugenda mu kirere, cyangwa se kuvugana n'inshuti. Niba ubona utishimye, byaba byiza kugana umuganga w'indwara zo mu mutwe.

scenario: A young girl feeling overwhelmed with school, family, or social pressures
instruction: Ndumva mfite umunaniro mwinshi kubera umuryango wanjye. Ni ubuhe buryo bwo kwihangana mu gihe nk'iki?
output: Umunaniro ni ibisanzwe. Jya ushaka umwanya wo kwiruhura, nko gukora imyitozo, cyangwa se kurara neza. Jya ushyiraho ingamba zo gukora neza. Jya uganira n'umuntu wizeye niba wumva ugomba gukemura ibibazo.

scenario: A young girl struggling with low self-confidence and self-worth
instruction: Ndimo kwishidikanya kuri njye n'ibyo nshoboye. Nakora iki ngo nzigereho kandi ntangiye kwigirira icyizere?
output: Kwizera ubushobozi bwawe ni intambwe ikomeye. Jya wandika ibyiza ukora buri munsi. Jya uhagarika kwigereranya n'abandi. Jya witoza kuvuga ibyiza kuri wowe, kandi wige kumenya ko agaciro kawe ari ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl having difficulty managing her emotions and reactions
instruction: Iyo abantu bansebye, ndarakara cyane. Nshaka kumenya uko nahagarika ibyemezo byanjye mu gihe nk'iki?
output: Iyo wumva urakaye, jya uhumeka cyane cyangwa se ugerageze kuva aho hantu. Ushobora no kwandika ibyo uri gutekereza, cyangwa se gukora imyitozo ya siporo. Ntuzigere uhangana na mugenzi wawe mu gihe urakaye. Jya utekereza neza mbere yo kugira icyo ukora.

scenario: A young girl struggling to adapt to changes in her life or family
instruction: Papa na Mama bagiye gutandukana, kandi ndumva ndetse n'agahinda. Nakora iki ngo mbimenyere?
output: Impinduka zirashobora kuba zikomeye, cyane cyane mu muryango. Jya wemera ko ufite uburenganzira bwo kwiyumva. Jya uganira n'umuntu wizeye cyangwa se umujyanama w'indwara zo mu mutwe. Wibuke ko igihe kizagenda kiza cyose, kandi uri umunyembaraga.

scenario: A young girl asking how to take care of her mental and emotional well-being
instruction: Nshaka kumenya uko nakwita ku buzima bwanjye bwo mu mutwe n'amarangamutima. Ni izihe ngamba zikomeye nshobora gukurikira?
output: Kwita ku buzima bwawe bwo mu mutwe ni ngombwa. Jya urara neza, uriye neza, kandi ukora imyitozo. Jya wihagararaho kandi wige gukora ibintu bikunezeza. Jya uganira n'inshuti zawe cyangwa se ababyeyi mu gihe uri kwishidikanya. Jya witoza guhumeka neza.

scenario: A young girl experiencing bullying at school or online
instruction: Hari umwana wandikira amagambo adakwiye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga. Nakora iki ngo mbihagarike?
output: Kwitinya ubwoba ni uburenganzira bwawe. Jya uhagarika (block) uwo muntu, kandi ubwire ababyeyi bawe cyangwa undi muntu mukuru wizeye ibyabaye. Ntuzigere uhangana na we ku murongo. Jya umenya ko ibyo akubwira atari byo.

scenario: A young girl feeling isolated and disconnected from others
instruction: Ndi kwihererana, kandi ndumva nshize n'agahinda. Nakora iki ngo nsubire mu buzima?
output: Kumva unaniwe ni ikibazo gikubangamiye, ariko ntabwo uri wenyine. Jya ugerageza gufungura amakuru ku nshuti n'ababyeyi. Jya witabira ibikorwa by'ishuri cyangwa se bya 'church'. Ushobora kandi kwibanda ku byiza cyangwa se gukora ibintu bikunezeza. Kwakira ubufasha bw'umuganga w'indwara zo mu mutwe byaba ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl having difficulty expressing her feelings and needs
instruction: Nshaka kumenya uko nabwira ababyeyi banjye ibyo ntekereza, kandi ntangiye kubyitondera.
output: Ni byiza ko uri gushaka uburyo bwo kuganira neza. Jya uvuga ibyo uri gutekereza neza, utuje kandi ukoresha amagambo adateye ubwoba. Jya witoza kuvuga 'Ndimo kumva...' aho kuvuga 'Uri gutuma numva...' Kuganira n'ababyeyi bawe bizagufasha kwihangana.

scenario: A young girl who has experienced a traumatic event and needs support
instruction: Hari ibintu nigeze kubona bingora kubyumva. Nshaka uburyo bwo gukemura ibyabaye.
output: Ni ngombwa cyane gushaka ubufasha. Jya uganira n'umuntu wizeye (umubyeyi, umujyanama). Bemerere umwanya wo kwiyumva. Jya ukora imyitozo yoroheje cyangwa se gukora ibintu bikunezeza. Kwakira ubufasha bw'umuganga w'indwara zo mu mutwe byaba ngombwa. Wibuke ko igihe gikiza ibintu.

scenario: A young girl asking how to become stronger and bounce back from difficulties
instruction: Nshaka kumenya uko nazigumya kumenyera mu buzima. Nakora iki ngo nkomeze kwihangana niba hari ikimbereye kibi?
output: Kwihangana bivuze kumenya ko mu buzima hari ibintu bikubabaza, ariko ukomeza gukora ibyiza. Jya wiga ku mpinduka, kandi wemere ko hari ibintu bitari byiza. Jya uganira n'inshuti zawe cyangwa se umuntu wizeye. Jya ugerageza kwibanda ku byiza mu buzima bwawe. Uko urushaho gukora ibyiza, niko urushaho gukura.

scenario: A young girl asking about her first period, what to expect, and how to manage it
instruction: Ese ni ibisanzwe ko mbona amaraso menshi cyane mu gihe cy'imihango? Nakora iki ngo ndekere kugira ubwoba?
output: Mu gihe cy'imihango, ni ibisanzwe ko amaraso amwe aba menshi kuruta andi. Icyakora, niba ubona ko ugomba guhindura ipamba (pads) buri masaha abiri, cyangwa se amaraso ariho iminsi irenga 7, jya uganira n'umubyeyi wawe cyangwa muganga. Kwiyitaho ni ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl asking about how her body changes during puberty
instruction: Ese ni ngombwa kumenya uko umubiri wanjye ukora? Nakura iki mu bumenyi bwanjye?
output: Yego, kumenya umubiri wawe ni ngombwa. Bizagufasha kwita ku buzima bwawe, gufata ibyemezo byiza, no kwirinda uburwayi. Jya ushaka amakuru yizewe ku buvuzi bwawe, kandi uganire n'ababyeyi bawe cyangwa se abandi bakuru wizeye. Kwibanda ku gukura kwawe ni intambwe ikomeye.

scenario: A young girl confused about physical changes happening to her body
instruction: Ndi kubona imyenda yanjye y'imbere ihengera umushyitsi (discharge). Ibyo biva ku iki?
output: Ibyo bita 'discharge' cyangwa 'umushyitsi' ni amazi akeye (atari amaraso) ava mu gitsina cyawe. Ni ibisanzwe kandi akenshi bigaragaza ko igitsina cyawe kiri kwisukura no kwirinda uburwayi. Iyo ushaka kumva wumutse, ushobora gukoresha 'pantyliner' yoroheje. Icyakora, niba uwo mushyitsi ufite impumuro mbi cyane cyangwa se ari ibara ryijimye cyane, jya uganira n'umuntu mukuru wizeye cyangwa muganga.

scenario: A young girl asking about proper hygiene practices during her period
instruction: Ese nshobora gukoresha amazi ashyushye cyane cyangwa ashyushye mu gitsina mu gihe cy'imihango?
output: Oya, ntabwo ari byiza gukoresha amazi ashyushye cyane cyangwa ashyushye mu gitsina. Amazi ashyushye agomba kuba atari ashyushye cyane. Kwita ku isuku bigufasha kumva witonze kandi ukomeza kuba umuntu w'umwimerere.

scenario: A young girl asking what consent means and how to recognize it
instruction: Niba umuntu yambwiye 'Yego' ariko akaba asa n'utishimye cyangwa afite ubwoba, ese ni ubwumvikane buzima?
output: Oya, ubwo ntabwo ari ubwumvikane buzima. Ubwumvikane bugomba gutangwa ku bushake bw'umuntu, nta bwoba cyangwa se gutinya biriho. 'Yego' yawe igomba kuba yaturutse ku mutima wawe, kandi ukaba wumva unyuzwe. Kwicecekera cyangwa gutinda kuvuga 'Yego' si ubwumvikane. Niba ubonye umuntu afite ikibazo, jya umuhagararira.

scenario: A young girl asking about what makes a healthy relationship with peers
instruction: Inshuti yanjye impora ivuga ko inshuti zanjye z'abagore n'abapfakazi atari nziza. Ese uwo ni umubano mwiza?
output: Oya, ntabwo ari umubano mwiza. Umubano mwiza ushingira ku cyizere no kubahana. Inshuti yawe igomba kubaha amahitamo yawe ku nshuti zindi. Iyo umuntu ashaka kugukura ku bandi, bishobora kuba ikimenyetso cy'uko ashaka kugushyira ku gitutu. Ni ngombwa kugira inshuti nyinshi, ntabwo ugomba kuba wenyine.

scenario: A young girl feeling pressured by friends to do something she's uncomfortable with
instruction: Inshuti zanjye zimpamagarira gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge. Nakora iki ngo mvuge 'Oya' ntangiye kubyanga?
output: Kuvuga 'Oya' ku biyobyabwenge ni intambwe ikomeye yo kwirinda. Ushobora kuvuga uti, 'Oya, ntabwo nshaka kubikora, kandi ndakwinginze ubaze undi muntu.' Ntugomba gusobanura impamvu. Ushobora no kuvuga ko ufite ikindi kigomba gukora. Kwirinda ibiyobyabwenge ni ngombwa cyane ku buzima bwawe.

scenario: A young girl struggling with how she looks and comparing herself to others
instruction: Ndi gutekereza ko ibiro byanjye bikabije. Nshaka kumenya uko nakwita ku mubiri wanjye.
output: Agaciro kawe ntikagombye guhagarara ku biro byawe. Ni byiza ko wita ku mubiri wawe ukoresheje kurya neza no gukora imyitozo. Jya wandika ibyiza ukora buri munsi (ubwenge, umutima mwiza, impano). Kwizera ubwiza bwawe bizagufasha kwihangana. Niba ugomba gukemura ibibazo byawe by'ibiryo, jya uganira n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl asking how to stay safe when walking alone or in public places
instruction: Ndi gutinya umuntu uhora agenda inyuma yanjye mu muhanda. Nakora iki ngo ndekere kugira ubwoba?
output: Jya uhagarara, urebe inyuma, kandi uta kuri uwo muntu. Jya ugenda ahantu hari abandi bantu cyangwa se ugende vuba mu rugo rw'inshuti. Niba ugomba, jya witabaza cyangwa se uhamagara umuntu mukuru wizeye. Kwirinda ni byiza kuruta kwicuza.

scenario: A young girl asking how to know if someone's behavior towards her is wrong
instruction: Hari umuntu uhora ankoraho ku buryo ntarabona. Ese ibyo byaba ari ibyaha?
output: Yego. Iyo umuntu agukozaho agaseke atarabyemeye cyangwa se akakubangamira, ni ikimenyetso cy'uko ari imyitwarire mibi. Niba umuntu akora ikintu kigutera ubwoba, jya umusubiza uti 'Hagarara!' mu ijwi rirenga. Jya uganira n'umuntu mukuru wizeye.

scenario: A young girl asking how to say no when she feels uncomfortable
instruction: Nshaka kumenya uko navuga 'Oya' ku gitekerezo cy'umugenzi wanjye w'urukundo cyane, kandi ntagira ubwoba.
output: Ufite uburenganzira bwo kuvuga 'Oya' mu gihe utanezerewe cyangwa se ubonye ko hari ikibazo. Ushobora kuvuga uti: 'Oya, sinshaka kubikora,' cyangwa 'Oya, ndumva bitari byiza.' Kuvuga 'Oya' bisobanura ko hari imipaka uriho. Jya wihagararaho kandi wige kumenya ko agaciro kawe ari ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl asking who she can talk to if something bad happens
instruction: Nabonye ikibazo cy'umugenzi wanjye, ariko sinzi uwo nabibwira kugira ngo ndamure. Nshaka ubufasha.
output: Ni ngombwa cyane gushaka ubufasha vuba na bwangu. Jya uganira n'umuntu mukuru wizeye (umubyeyi, umuyobozi w'itorero, umujyanama w'ishuri). Ntuzigere ukomeza kwihisha ibyabaye. Ufite uburenganzira bwo kubaho mu mahoro.

scenario: A young girl asking about staying safe on the internet and social media
instruction: Hari umuntu untera ubwoba kuri interineti kandi ntazi. Nakora iki ngo mbihagarike?
output: Jya uhagarika (block) uwo muntu, kandi ubwire ababyeyi bawe cyangwa undi muntu mukuru wizeye ibyabaye. Ntuzigere uhangana na we ku murongo. Jya wita ku 'privacy settings' zawe kugira ngo wikize ibyago.

scenario: A young girl asking what personal information she should not share
instruction: Ese nshobora gutanga izina ry'umubyeyi wanjye kuri interineti kugira ngo ndamure?
output: Oya, ntugomba gutanga izina ry'umubyeyi wawe cyangwa se amakuru yawe bwite kuri interineti. Amakuru nk'ayo ashyira umuryango wawe mu kaga. Ntuzigere uhereza umuntu amakuru yawe bwite, nubwo mwaba mwaraziranye kuri interineti.

instruction: Hari umuhungu uhora antera ubwoba n'amagambo adakwiye. Nakora iki ngo ndekere kugira ubwoba?

scenario: A young girl experiencing bullying at school or online
instruction: Hari umwana unteye ubwoba mu buryo bwo kungirira nabi. Nakora iki ngo mbihagarike?

scenario: A young girl feeling isolated and disconnected from others
instruction: Ndi kwihererana, kandi ndumva nshize n'agahinda. Nakora iki ngo nsubire mu buzima, kandi ngire inshuti?
output: Kumva unaniwe ni ikibazo gikubangamiye, ariko ntabwo uri wenyine. Jya ugerageza gufungura amakuru ku nshuti n'ababyeyi. Jya witabira ibikorwa by'ishuri cyangwa se bya 'church'. Ushobora kandi kwibanda ku byiza cyangwa se gukora ibintu bikunezeza. Kwakira ubufasha bw'umuganga w'indwara zo mu mutwe byaba ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl having difficulty expressing her feelings and needs
instruction: Nshaka kumenya uko nabwira ababyeyi banjye ibyo ntekereza, kandi ntangiye kubyitondera.
output: Ni byiza ko uri gushaka uburyo bwo kuganira neza. Jya uvuga ibyo uri gutekereza neza, utuje kandi ukoresha amagambo adateye ubwoba. Jya witoza kuvuga 'Ndimo kumva...' aho kuvuga 'Uri gutuma numva...' Kuganira n'ababyeyi bawe bizagufasha kwihangana.

scenario: A young girl who has experienced a traumatic event and needs support
instruction: Hari ibintu nigeze kubona bingora kubyumva. Nshaka uburyo bwo gukemura ibyabaye.
output: Ni ngombwa cyane gushaka ubufasha. Jya uganira n'umuntu wizeye (umubyeyi, umujyanama). Bemerere umwanya wo kwiyumva. Jya ukora imyitozo yoroheje cyangwa se gukora ibintu bikunezeza. Kwakira ubufasha bw'umuganga w'indwara zo mu mutwe byaba ngombwa. Wibuke ko igihe gikiza ibintu.

scenario: A young girl asking how to become stronger and bounce back from difficulties
instruction: Nshaka kumenya uko nazigumya kumenyera mu buzima. Nakora iki ngo nkomeze kwihangana niba hari ikimbereye kibi?
output: Kwihangana bivuze kumenya ko mu buzima hari ibintu bikubabaza, ariko ukomeza gukora ibyiza. Jya wiga ku mpinduka, kandi wemere ko hari ibintu bitari byiza. scenario: A young girl asking about her first period, what to expect, and how to manage it
instruction: Ese ni ibisanzwe ko mbona amaraso menshi cyane mu gihe cy'imihango? Nakora iki ngo ndekere kugira ubwoba?
output: Mu gihe cy'imihango, ni ibisanzwe ko amaraso amwe aba menshi kuruta andi. Icyakora, niba ubona ko ugomba guhindura ipamba (pads) buri masaha abiri, cyangwa se amaraso ariho iminsi irenga 7, jya uganira n'umubyeyi wawe cyangwa muganga. Kwiyitaho ni ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl asking about how her body changes during puberty
instruction: Ese ni ngombwa kumenya uko umubiri wanjye ukora? Nakura iki mu bumenyi bwanjye?
output: Yego, kumenya umubiri wawe ni ngombwa. Bizagufasha kwita ku buzima bwawe, gufata ibyemezo byiza, no kwirinda uburwayi. Jya ushaka amakuru yizewe ku buvuzi bwawe, kandi uganire n'ababyeyi bawe cyangwa se abandi bakuru wizeye. Kwibanda ku gukura kwawe ni intambwe ikomeye.

scenario: A young girl confused about physical changes happening to her body
instruction: Ndi kubona imyenda yanjye y'imbere ihengera umushyitsi (discharge). Ibyo biva ku iki?
output: Ibyo bita 'discharge' cyangwa 'umushyitsi' ni amazi akeye (atari amaraso) ava mu gitsina cyawe. Ni ibisanzwe kandi akenshi bigaragaza ko igitsina cyawe kiri kwisukura no kwirinda uburwayi. Iyo ushaka kumva wumutse, ushobora gukoresha 'pantyliner' yoroheje. Icyakora, niba uwo mushyitsi ufite impumuro mbi cyane cyangwa se ari ibara ryijimye cyane, jya uganira n'umuntu mukuru wizeye cyangwa muganga.

scenario: A young girl asking about proper hygiene practices during her period
instruction: Ese nshobora gukoresha amazi ashyushye cyane cyangwa ashyushye mu gitsina mu gihe cy'imihango?
output: Oya, ntabwo ari byiza gukoresha amazi ashyushye cyane cyangwa ashyushye mu gitsina. Amazi ashyushye agomba kuba atari ashyushye cyane. Kwita ku isuku bigufasha kumva witonze kandi ukomeza kuba umuntu w'umwimerere.

scenario: A young girl asking what consent means and how to recognize it
instruction: Niba umuntu yambwiye 'Yego' ariko akaba asa n'utishimye cyangwa afite ubwoba, ese ni ubwumvikane buzima?
output: Oya, ubwo ntabwo ari ubwumvikane buzima. Ubwumvikane bugomba gutangwa ku bushake bw'umuntu, nta bwoba cyangwa se gutinya biriho. 'Yego' yawe igomba kuba yaturutse ku mutima wawe, kandi ukaba wumva unyuzwe. Kwicecekera cyangwa gutinda kuvuga 'Yego' si ubwumvikane. Niba ubonye umuntu afite ikibazo, jya umuhagararira.

scenario: A young girl asking about what makes a healthy relationship with peers
instruction: Inshuti yanjye impora ivuga ko inshuti zanjye z'abagore n'abapfakazi atari nziza. Ese uwo ni umubano mwiza?
output: Oya, ntabwo ari umubano mwiza. Umubano mwiza ushingira ku cyizere no kubahana. Inshuti yawe igomba kubaha amahitomo yawe ku nshuti zindi. Iyo umuntu ashaka kugukura ku bandi, bishobora kuba ikimenyetso cy'uko ashaka kugushyira ku gitutu. Ni ngombwa kugira inshuti nyinshi, ntabwo ugomba kuba wenyine.

scenario: A young girl feeling pressured by friends to do something she's uncomfortable with
instruction: Inshuti zanjye zimpamagarira gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge. Nakora iki ngo mvuge 'Oya' ntangiye kubyanga?
output: Kuvuga 'Oya' ku biyobyabwenge ni intambwe ikomeye yo kwirinda. Ushobora kuvuga uti, 'Oya, ntabwo nshaka kubikora, kandi ndakwinginze ubaze undi muntu.' Ntugomba gusobanura impamvu. Ushobora no kuvuga ko ufite ikindi kigomba gukora. Kwirinda ibiyobyabwenge ni ngombwa cyane ku buzima bwawe.

scenario: A young girl struggling with how she looks and comparing herself to others
instruction: Ndi gutekereza ko ibiro byanjye bikabije. Nshaka kumenya uko nakwita ku mubiri wanjye.
output: Agaciro kawe ntikagombye guhagarara ku biro byawe. Ni byiza ko wita ku mubiri wawe ukoresheje kurya neza no gukora imyitozo. scenario: A young girl asking how to stay safe when walking alone or in public places
instruction: Ndi gutinya umuntu uhora agenda inyuma yanjye mu muhanda. Nakora iki ngo ndekere kugira ubwoba?
output: Jya uhagarara, urebe inyuma, kandi uta kuri uwo muntu. Jya ugenda ahantu hari abandi bantu cyangwa se ugende vuba mu rugo rw'inshuti. Niba ugomba, jya witabaza cyangwa se uhamagara umuntu mukuru wizeye. Kwirinda ni byiza kuruta kwicuza.

scenario: A young girl asking how to know if someone's behavior towards her is wrong
instruction: Hari umuntu uhora ankoraho ku buryo ntarabona. Ese ibyo byaba ari ibyaha?

scenario: A young girl asking how to say no when she feels uncomfortable
instruction: Nshaka kumenya uko navuga 'Oya' ku gitekerezo cy'umugenzi wanjye w'urukundo cyane, kandi ntagira ubwoba.

scenario: A young girl asking who she can talk to if something bad happens
instruction: Nabonye ikibazo cy'umugenzi wanjye, ariko sinzi uwo nabibwira kugira ngo ndamure. Nshaka ubufasha.

instruction: Nshaka kumenya uko nakwita ku buzima bwanjye bwo mu mutwe n'amarangamutima. Ni izihe ngamba zikomeye nshobora gukurikira?

scenario: A young girl asking about her first period, what to expect, and how to manage it
instruction: Ese ni ibisanzwe ko mbona amaraso menshi cyane mu gihe cy'imihango? Nakora iki ngo ndekere kugira ubwoba?
output: Mu gihe cy'imihango, ni ibisanzwe ko amaraso amwe aba menshi kuruta andi. Icyakora, niba ubona ko ugomba guhindura ipamba (pads) buri masaha abiri, cyangwa se amaraso ariho iminsi irenga 7, jya uganira n'umubyeyi wawe cyangwa muganga. Kwiyitaho ni ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl asking about how her body changes during puberty
instruction: Ese ni ngombwa kumenya uko umubiri wanjye ukora? Nakura iki mu bumenyi bwanjye?
output: Yego, kumenya umubiri wawe ni ngombwa. Bizagufasha kwita ku buzima bwawe, gufata ibyemezo byiza, no kwirinda uburwayi. Jya ushaka amakuru yizewe ku buvuzi bwawe, kandi uganire n'ababyeyi bawe cyangwa se abandi bakuru wizeye. Kwibanda ku gukura kwawe ni intambwe ikomeye.

scenario: A young girl confused about physical changes happening to her body
instruction: Ndi kubona imyenda yanjye y'imbere ihengera umushyitsi (discharge). Ibyo biva ku iki?
output: Ibyo bita 'discharge' cyangwa 'umushyitsi' ni amazi akeye (atari amaraso) ava mu gitsina cyawe. Ni ibisanzwe kandi akenshi bigaragaza ko igitsina cyawe kiri kwisukura no kwirinda uburwayi. Iyo ushaka kumva wumutse, ushobora gukoresha 'pantyliner' yoroheje. Icyakora, niba uwo mushyitsi ufite impumuro mbi cyane cyangwa se ari ibara ryijimye cyane, jya uganira n'umuntu mukuru wizeye cyangwa muganga.

scenario: A young girl asking about proper hygiene practices during her period
instruction: Ese nshobora gukoresha amazi ashyushye cyane cyangwa ashyushye mu gitsina mu gihe cy'imihango?

scenario: A young girl asking what consent means and how to recognize it
instruction: Niba umuntu yambwiye 'Yego' ariko akaba asa n'utishimye cyangwa afite ubwoba, ese ni ubwumvikane buzima?

instruction: Inshuti yanjye impora ivuga ko inshuti zanjye z'abagore n'abapfakazi atari nziza. Ese uwo ni umubano mwiza?

output: Mu gihe cy'imihango, ni ibisanzwe ko amaraso amwe aba menshi kuruta andi. Icyakora, niba ubona ko ugomba guhindura ipamba (pads) buri masaha abiri, cyangwa se amaraso ariho iminsi irenga 7, jya uganira n'umubyeyi wawe cyangwa muganga. Kwiyitaho ni ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl asking about how her body changes during puberty
instruction: Ese ni ngombwa kumenya uko umubiri wanjye ukora? Nakura iki mu bumenyi bwanjye?
output: Yego, kumenya umubiri wawe ni ngombwa. Bizagufasha kwita ku buzima bwawe, gufata ibyemezo byiza, no kwirinda uburwayi. Jya ushaka amakuru yizewe ku buvuzi bwawe, kandi uganire n'ababyeyi bawe cyangwa se abandi bakuru wizeye. Kwibanda ku gukura kwawe ni intambwe ikomeye.

scenario: A young girl confused about physical changes happening to her body
instruction: Ndi kubona imyenda yanjye y'imbere ihengera umushyitsi (discharge). Ibyo biva ku iki?
output: Ibyo bita 'discharge' cyangwa 'umushyitsi' ni amazi akeye (atari amaraso) ava mu gitsina cyawe. Ni ibisanzwe kandi akenshi bigaragaza ko igitsina cyawe kiri kwisukura no kwirinda uburwayi. Iyo ushaka kumva wumutse, ushobora gukoresha 'pantyliner' yoroheje. Icyakora, niba uwo mushyitsi ufite impumuro mbi cyane cyangwa se ari ibara ryijimye cyane, jya uganira n'umuntu mukuru wizeye cyangwa muganga.

scenario: A young girl asking about proper hygiene practices during her period
instruction: Ese nshobora gukoresha amazi ashyushye cyane cyangwa ashyushye mu gitsina mu gihe cy'imihango?
output: Oya, ntabwo ari byiza gukoresha amazi ashyushye cyane cyangwa ashyushye mu gitsina. Amazi ashyushye agomba kuba atari ashyushye cyane. Kwita ku isuku bigufasha kumva witonze kandi ukomeza kuba umuntu w'umwimerere.

scenario: A young girl asking what consent means and how to recognize it
instruction: Niba umuntu yambwiye 'Yego' ariko akaba asa n'utishimye cyangwa afite ubwoba, ese ni ubwumvikane buzima?
output: Oya, ubwo ntabwo ari ubwumvikane buzima. Ubwumvikane bugomba gutangwa ku bushake bw'umuntu, nta bwoba cyangwa se gutinya biriho. 'Yego' yawe igomba kuba yaturutse ku mutima wawe, kandi ukaba wumva unyuzwe. Kwicecekera cyangwa gutinda kuvuga 'Yego' si ubwumvikane. Niba ubonye umuntu afite ikibazo, jya umuhagararira.

scenario: A young girl asking about what makes a healthy relationship with peers
instruction: Inshuti yanjye impora ivuga ko inshuti zanjye z'abagore n'abapfakazi atari nziza. Ese uwo ni umubano mwiza?
output: Oya, ntabwo ari umubano mwiza. Umubano mwiza ushingira ku cyizere no kubahana. Inshuti yawe igomba kubaha amahitomo yawe ku nshuti zindi. Iyo umuntu ashaka kugukura ku bandi, bishobora kuba ikimenyetso cy'uko ashaka kugushyira ku gitutu. Ni ngombwa kugira inshuti nyinshi, ntabwo ugomba kuba wenyine.

scenario: A young girl feeling pressured by friends to do something she's uncomfortable with
instruction: Inshuti zanjye zimpamagarira gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge. Nakora iki ngo mvuge 'Oya' ntangiye kubyanga?
output: Kuvuga 'Oya' ku biyobyabwenge ni intambwe ikomeye yo kwirinda. Ushobora kuvuga uti, 'Oya, ntabwo nshaka kubikora, kandi ndakwinginze ubaze undi muntu.' Ntugomba gusobanura impamvu. Ushobora no kuvuga ko ufite ikindi kigomba gukora. Kwirinda ibiyobyabwenge ni ngombwa cyane ku buzima bwawe.

scenario: A young girl struggling with how she looks and comparing herself to others
instruction: Ndi gutekereza ko ibiro byanjye bikabije. Nshaka kumenya uko nakwita ku mubiri wanjye.
output: Agaciro kawe ntikagombye guhagarara ku biro byawe. Ni byiza ko wita ku mubiri wawe ukoresheje kurya neza no gukora imyitozo. Jya wandika ibyiza ukora buri munsi (ubwenge, umutima mwiza, impano). Kwizera ubwiza bwawe bizagufasha kwihangana. Niba ugomba gukemura ibibazo byawe by'ibiryo, jya uganira n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl asking how to stay safe when walking alone or in public places
instruction: Ndi gutinya umuntu uhora agenda inyuma yanjye mu muhanda. Nakora iki ngo ndekere kugira ubwoba?
output: Jya uhagarara, urebe inyuma, kandi uta kuri uwo muntu. Jya ugenda ahantu hari abandi bantu cyangwa se ugende vuba mu rugo rw'inshuti. Niba ugomba, jya witabaza cyangwa se uhamagara umuntu mukuru wizeye. Kwirinda ni byiza kuruta kwicuza.

scenario: A young girl asking how to know if someone's behavior towards her is wrong
instruction: Hari umuntu uhora ankoraho ku buryo ntarabona. Ese ibyo byaba ari ibyaha?
output: Yego. Iyo umuntu agukozaho agaseke atarabyemeye cyangwa se akakubangamira, ni ikimenyetso cy'uko ari imyitwarire mibi. Niba umuntu akora ikintu kigutera ubwoba, jya umusubiza uti 'Hagarara!' mu ijwi rirenga. Jya uganira n'umuntu mukuru wizeye.

scenario: A young girl asking how to say no when she feels uncomfortable
instruction: Nshaka kumenya uko navuga 'Oya' ku gitekerezo cy'umugenzi wanjye w'urukundo cyane, kandi ntagira ubwoba.
output: Ufite uburenganzira bwo kuvuga 'Oya' mu gihe utanezerewe cyangwa se ubonye ko hari ikibazo. Ushobora kuvuga uti: 'Oya, sinshaka kubikora,' cyangwa 'Oya, ndumva bitari byiza.' Kuvuga 'Oya' bisobanura ko hari imipaka uriho. Jya wihagararaho kandi wige kumenya ko agaciro kawe ari ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl asking who she can talk to if something bad happens
instruction: Nabonye ikibazo cy'umugenzi wanjye, ariko sinzi uwo nabibwira kugira ngo ndamure. Nshaka ubufasha.
output: Ni ngombwa cyane gushaka ubufasha vuba na bwangu. Jya uganira n'umuntu mukuru wizeye (umubyeyi, umuyobozi w'itorero, umujyanama w'ishuri). Ntuzigere ukomeza kwihisha ibyabaye. Ufite uburenganzira bwo kubaho mu mahoro.

scenario: A young girl asking about staying safe on the internet and social media
instruction: Hari umuntu untera ubwoba kuri interineti kandi ntazi. Nakora iki ngo mbihagarike?
output: Jya uhagarika (block) uwo muntu, kandi ubwire ababyeyi bawe cyangwa undi muntu mukuru wizeye ibyabaye. Ntuzigere uhangana na we ku murongo. Jya wita ku 'privacy settings' zawe kugira ngo wikize ibyago.

scenario: A young girl asking what personal information she should not share
instruction: Ese nshobora gutanga izina ry'umubyeyi wanjye kuri interineti kugira ngo ndamure?
output: Oya, ntugomba gutanga izina ry'umubyeyi wawe cyangwa se amakuru yawe bwite kuri interineti. Amakuru nk'ayo ashyira umuryango wawe mu kaga. Ntuzigere uhereza umuntu amakuru yawe bwite, nubwo mwaba mwaraziranye kuri interineti.

scenario: A young girl asking what to do when someone gives her unwanted attention
instruction: Hari umuhungu uhora antera ubwoba n'amagambo adakwiye. Nakora iki ngo ndekere kugira ubwoba?
output: Jya ugerageza kumusubiza uti 'Hagarara!' mu ijwi rirenga. Niba adahagarara, jya umuhagarika (block) kandi ubwire umuntu mukuru wizeye. Niba ari hafi, jya ugenda ahantu hari abandi bantu cyangwa se ugende vuba. Wibuke ko ufite uburenganzira bwo kwubahwa.

scenario: A young girl asking how to identify safe places and people
instruction: Nshaka kumenya uburyo bwo gukemura ikibazo kiri mu rugo. Ahantu hizewe ni he nabiganiriraho?
output: Ahantu hizewe ni ahantu wumva uri wenyine, kandi abantu ntibaguteye ubwoba. Ushobora kujya ahantu hari umuyobozi w'itorero, umujyanama w'ishuri, cyangwa se urugo rwa mugenzi wawe wizeye. Kwita ku mutekano wawe ni ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Ndi gutinya cyane ibizamini, kandi ndumva mbifitiye ubwoba. Ni ubuhe buryo bwo gukemura ubwo bwoba?
output: Ubwo bwoba ni ibisanzwe. Jya ugerageza guhumeka cyane mbere yo gutangira ikizami. Jya wita ku gutegura ibizamini neza, kandi wige kumenya ko ibyo byakubayeho bikubera intambwe yo gukura. Niba ubwoba bukabije, jya uganira n'umujyanama w'ishuri.

scenario: A young girl feeling sad, hopeless, and losing interest in activities she used to enjoy
instruction: Ndi kumva agahinda gakabije, sinishimye. Nakora iki ngo mpindure imyumvire yanjye?
output: Agahinda gakabije birashobora kugutera gucika intege, ariko wibuke ko ushoboye. Jya ushaka umuntu wizeye cyangwa se undi muntu mukuru ushobora kuganira na we. Jya ukora ibintu byiza, nko kugenda mu kirere, cyangwa se kuvugana n'inshuti. Niba ubona utishimye, byaba byiza kugana umuganga w'indwara zo mu mutwe.

scenario: A young girl feeling overwhelmed with school, family, or social pressures
instruction: Ndumva mfite umunaniro mwinshi kubera umuryango wanjye. Ni ubuhe buryo bwo kwihangana mu gihe nk'iki?
output: Umunaniro ni ibisanzwe. Jya ushaka umwanya wo kwiruhura, nko gukora imyitozo, cyangwa se kurara neza. Jya ushyiraho ingamba zo gukora neza. Jya uganira n'umuntu wizeye niba wumva ugomba gukemura ibibazo.

scenario: A young girl struggling with low self-confidence and self-worth
instruction: Ndimo kwishidikanya kuri njye n'ibyo nshoboye. Nakora iki ngo nzigereho kandi ntangiye kwigirira icyizere?
output: Kwizera ubushobozi bwawe ni intambwe ikomeye. Jya wandika ibyiza ukora buri munsi. Jya uhagarika kwigereranya n'abandi. Jya witoza kuvuga ibyiza kuri wowe, kandi wige kumenya ko agaciro kawe ari ngombwa. Kwiyitaho ni intambwe ikomeye.

scenario: A young girl having difficulty managing her emotions and reactions
instruction: Iyo ababyeyi banjye barakaye, ndahunga cyangwa se nkarira. Nshaka kumenya uko nahagarika ibyemezo byanjye mu gihe nk'iki?
output: Iyo wumva urakaye cyangwa ufite ubwoba, jya uhumeka cyane cyangwa se ugerageze kuva aho hantu. Ushobora no kwandika ibyo uri gutekereza. Jya ushaka umwanya wo kwiruhura, nko gukora imyitozo ya siporo. Ntuzigere uhangana na mugenzi wawe mu gihe urakaye. Jya utekereza neza mbere yo kugira icyo ukora.

scenario: A young girl struggling to adapt to changes in her life or family
instruction: Ndi gutangira ishuri rishya, kandi ndumva ndetse n'agahinda. Nakora iki ngo mbimenyere?
output: Impinduka zirashobora kuba zikomeye, ariko ni ibisanzwe. Jya ugerageza gushaka inshuti, kandi wita ku bintu bikunezeza. Jya uganira n'umuntu wizeye cyangwa se umujyanama w'ishuri. Wibuke ko igihe kizagenda kiza cyose, kandi uri umunyembaraga.

scenario: A young girl asking how to take care of her mental and emotional well-being
instruction: Nshaka kumenya uko nakwita ku buzima bwanjye bwo mu mutwe n'amarangamutima. Ni izihe ngamba zikomeye nshobora gukurikira?
output: Kwita ku buzima bwawe bwo mu mutwe ni ngombwa. Jya urara neza, uriye neza, kandi ukora imyitozo. Jya wihagararaho kandi wige gukora ibintu bikunezeza. Jya uganira n'inshuti zawe cyangwa se ababyeyi mu gihe uri kwishidikanya. Jya witoza guhumeka neza.

scenario: A young girl experiencing bullying at school or online
instruction: Hari umwana unteye ubwoba mu buryo bwo kungirira nabi. Nakora iki ngo mbihagarike?
output: Kwitinya ubwoba ni uburenganzira bwawe. Jya uganira n'umwarimu cyangwa se umuntu mukuru wizeye ku ishuri. Ntuzigere ugumana na mugenzi wawe wenyine. Jya umenya ko ibyo akubwira atari byo. Jya wihagararaho kandi wige kumenya ko agaciro kawe ari ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl feeling isolated and disconnected from others
instruction: Ndi kwihererana, kandi ndumva nshize n'agahinda. Nakora iki ngo nsubire mu buzima, kandi ngire inshuti?
output: Kumva unaniwe ni ikibazo gikubangamiye, ariko ntabwo uri wenyine. Jya ugerageza gufungura amakuru ku nshuti n'ababyeyi. Jya witabira ibikorwa by'ishuri cyangwa se bya 'church'. Ushobora kandi kwibanda ku byiza cyangwa se gukora ibintu bikunezeza. Kwakira ubufasha bw'umuganga w'indwara zo mu mutwe byaba ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl having difficulty expressing her feelings and needs
instruction: Nshaka kumenya uko nabwira ababyeyi banjye ibyo ntekereza, kandi ntangiye kubyitondera.
output: Ni byiza ko uri gushaka uburyo bwo kuganira neza. Jya uvuga ibyo uri gutekereza neza, utuje kandi ukoresha amagambo adateye ubwoba. Jya witoza kuvuga 'Ndimo kumva...' aho kuvuga 'Uri gutuma numva...' Kuganira n'ababyeyi bawe bizagufasha kwihangana.

scenario: A young girl who has experienced a traumatic event and needs support
instruction: Hari ibintu nigeze kubona bingora kubyumva. Nshaka uburyo bwo gukemura ibyabaye.
output: Ni ngombwa cyane gushaka ubufasha. Jya uganira n'umuntu wizeye (umubyeyi, umujyanama). Bemerere umwanya wo kwiyumva. Jya ukora imyitozo yoroheje cyangwa se gukora ibintu bikunezeza. Kwakira ubufasha bw'umuganga w'indwara zo mu mutwe byaba ngombwa. Wibuke ko igihe gikiza ibintu.

scenario: A young girl asking how to become stronger and bounce back from difficulties
instruction: Nshaka kumenya uko nazigumya kumenyera mu buzima. Nakora iki ngo nkomeze kwihangana niba hari ikimbereye kibi?
output: Kwihangana bivuze kumenya ko mu buzima hari ibintu bikubabaza, ariko ukomeza gukora ibyiza. Jya wiga ku mpinduka, kandi wemere ko hari ibintu bitari byiza. Jya uganira n'inshuti zawe cyangwa se umuntu wizeye. Jya ugerageza kwibanda ku byiza mu buzima bwawe. Uko urushaho gukora ibyiza, niko urushaho gukura.

Jya ukora ibintu byiza, nko kugenda mu kirere, cyangwa se kuvugana n'inshuti. Niba ubona utishimye, byaba byiza kugana umuganga w'indwara zo mu mutwe.

scenario: A young girl feeling overwhelmed with school, family, or social pressures
instruction: Ndumva mfite umunaniro mwinshi kubera umuryango wanjye. Ni ubuhe buryo bwo kwihangana mu gihe nk'iki?
output: Umunaniro ni ibisanzwe. Jya ushaka umwanya wo kwiruhura, nko gukora imyitozo, cyangwa se kurara neza. Jya ushyiraho ingamba zo gukora neza. Jya uganira n'umuntu wizeye niba wumva ugomba gukemura ibibazo.

scenario: A young girl struggling with low self-confidence and self-worth
instruction: Ndimo kwishidikanya kuri njye n'ibyo nshoboye. Nakora iki ngo nzigereho kandi ntangiye kwigirira icyizere?
output: Kwizera ubushobozi bwawe ni intambwe ikomeye. Jya wandika ibyiza ukora buri munsi. Jya uhagarika kwigereranya n'abandi. Jya witoza kuvuga ibyiza kuri wowe, kandi wige kumenya ko agaciro kawe ari ngombwa. Kwiyitaho ni intambwe ikomeye.

scenario: A young girl having difficulty managing her emotions and reactions
instruction: Iyo ababyeyi banjye barakaye, ndahunga cyangwa se nkarira. Nshaka kumenya uko nahagarika ibyemezo byanjye mu gihe nk'iki?
output: Iyo wumva urakaye cyangwa ufite ubwoba, jya uhumeka cyane cyangwa se ugerageze kuva aho hantu. Ushobora no kwandika ibyo uri gutekereza. Jya ushaka umwanya wo kwiruhura, nko gukora imyitozo ya siporo. Ntuzigere uhangana na mugenzi wawe mu gihe urakaye. Jya utekereza neza mbere yo kugira icyo ukora.

scenario: A young girl struggling to adapt to changes in her life or family
instruction: Ndi gutangira ishuri rishya, kandi ndumva ndetse n'agahinda. Nakora iki ngo mbimenyere?
output: Impinduka zirashobora kuba zikomeye, ariko ni ibisanzwe. Jya ugerageza gushaka inshuti, kandi wita ku bintu bikunezeza. Jya uganira n'umuntu wizeye cyangwa se umujyanama w'ishuri. Wibuke ko igihe kizagenda kiza cyose, kandi uri umunyembaraga.

scenario: A young girl asking how to take care of her mental and emotional well-being
instruction: Nshaka kumenya uko nakwita ku buzima bwanjye bwo mu mutwe n'amarangamutima. Ni izihe ngamba zikomeye nshobora gukurikira?
output: Kwita ku buzima bwawe bwo mu mutwe ni ngombwa. Jya urara neza, uriye neza, kandi ukora imyitozo. Jya wihagararaho kandi wige gukora ibintu bikunezeza. Jya uganira n'inshuti zawe cyangwa se ababyeyi mu gihe uri kwishidikanya. Jya witoza guhumeka neza.

scenario: A young girl experiencing bullying at school or online
instruction: Hari umwana unteye ubwoba mu buryo bwo kungirira nabi. Nakora iki ngo mbihagarike?
output: Kwitinya ubwoba ni uburenganzira bwawe. Jya uganira n'umwarimu cyangwa se umuntu mukuru wizeye ku ishuri. Ntuzigere ugumana na mugenzi wawe wenyine. Jya umenya ko ibyo akubwira atari byo. Jya wihagararaho kandi wige kumenya ko agaciro kawe ari ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl feeling isolated and disconnected from others
instruction: Ndi kwihererana, kandi ndumva nshize n'agahinda. Nakora iki ngo nsubire mu buzima, kandi ngire inshuti?
output: Kumva unaniwe ni ikibazo gikubangamiye, ariko ntabwo uri wenyine. Jya ugerageza gufungura amakuru ku nshuti n'ababyeyi. Jya witabira ibikorwa by'ishuri cyangwa se bya 'church'. Ushobora kandi kwibanda ku byiza cyangwa se gukora ibintu bikunezeza. Kwakira ubufasha bw'umuganga w'indwara zo mu mutwe byaba ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl having difficulty expressing her feelings and needs
instruction: Nshaka kumenya uko nabwira ababyeyi banjye ibyo ntekereza, kandi ntangiye kubyitondera.
output: Ni byiza ko uri gushaka uburyo bwo kuganira neza. Jya uvuga ibyo uri gutekereza neza, utuje kandi ukoresha amagambo adateye ubwoba. Jya witoza kuvuga 'Ndimo kumva...' aho kuvuga 'Uri gutuma numva...' Kuganira n'ababyeyi bawe bizagufasha kwihangana.

scenario: A young girl who has experienced a traumatic event and needs support
instruction: Hari ibintu nigeze kubona bingora kubyumva. Nshaka uburyo bwo gukemura ibyabaye.
output: Ni ngombwa cyane gushaka ubufasha. Jya uganira n'umuntu wizeye (umubyeyi, umujyanama). Bemerere umwanya wo kwiyumva. Jya ukora imyitozo yoroheje cyangwa se gukora ibintu bikunezeza. Kwakira ubufasha bw'umuganga w'indwara zo mu mutwe byaba ngombwa. Wibuke ko igihe gikiza ibintu.

scenario: A young girl asking how to become stronger and bounce back from difficulties
instruction: Nshaka kumenya uko nazigumya kumenyera mu buzima. Nakora iki ngo nkomeze kwihangana niba hari ikimbereye kibi?
output: Kwihangana bivuze kumenya ko mu buzima hari ibintu bikubabaza, ariko ukomeza gukora ibyiza. Jya wiga ku mpinduka, kandi wemere ko hari ibintu bitari byiza. Jya uganira n'inshuti zawe cyangwa se umuntu wizeye. Jya ugerageza kwibanda ku byiza mu buzima bwawe. Uko urushaho gukora ibyiza, niko urushaho gukura.

scenario: A young girl asking about her first period, what to expect, and how to manage it
instruction: Ese ni ibisanzwe ko mbona amaraso menshi cyane mu gihe cy'imihango? Nakora iki ngo ndekere kugira ubwoba?
output: Mu gihe cy'imihango, ni ibisanzwe ko amaraso amwe aba menshi kuruta andi. Icyakora, niba ubona ko ugomba guhindura ipamba (pads) buri masaha abiri, cyangwa se amaraso ariho iminsi irenga 7, jya uganira n'umubyeyi wawe cyangwa muganga. Kwiyitaho ni ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl asking about how her body changes during puberty
instruction: Ese ni ngombwa kumenya uko umubiri wanjye ukora? Nakura iki mu bumenyi bwanjye?
output: Yego, kumenya umubiri wawe ni ngombwa. Bizagufasha kwita ku buzima bwawe, gufata ibyemezo byiza, no kwirinda uburwayi. Jya ushaka amakuru yizewe ku buvuzi bwawe, kandi uganire n'ababyeyi bawe cyangwa se abandi bakuru wizeye. Kwibanda ku gukura kwawe ni intambwe ikomeye.

scenario: A young girl confused about physical changes happening to her body
instruction: Ndi kubona imyenda yanjye y'imbere ihengera umushyitsi (discharge). Ibyo biva ku iki?
output: Ibyo bita 'discharge' cyangwa 'umushyitsi' ni amazi akeye (atari amaraso) ava mu gitsina cyawe. Ni ibisanzwe kandi akenshi bigaragaza ko igitsina cyawe kiri kwisukura no kwirinda uburwayi. Iyo ushaka kumva wumutse, ushobora gukoresha 'pantyliner' yoroheje. Icyakora, niba uwo mushyitsi ufite impumuro mbi cyane cyangwa se ari ibara ryijimye cyane, jya uganira n'umuntu mukuru wizeye cyangwa muganga.

scenario: A young girl asking about proper hygiene practices during her period
instruction: Ese nshobora gukoresha amazi ashyushye cyane cyangwa ashyushye mu gitsina mu gihe cy'imihango?
output: Oya, ntabwo ari byiza gukoresha amazi ashyushye cyane cyangwa ashyushye mu gitsina. Amazi ashyushye agomba kuba atari ashyushye cyane. Kwita ku isuku bigufasha kumva witonze kandi ukomeza kuba umuntu w'umwimerere.

scenario: A young girl asking what consent means and how to recognize it
instruction: Niba umuntu yambwiye 'Yego' ariko akaba asa n'utishimye cyangwa afite ubwoba, ese ni ubwumvikane buzima?
output: Oya, ubwo ntabwo ari ubwumvikane buzima. Ubwumvikane bugomba gutangwa ku bushake bw'umuntu, nta bwoba cyangwa se gutinya biriho. 'Yego' yawe igomba kuba yaturutse ku mutima wawe, kandi ukaba wumva unyuzwe. Kwicecekera cyangwa gutinda kuvuga 'Yego' si ubwumvikane. Niba ubonye umuntu afite ikibazo, jya umuhagararira.

scenario: A young girl asking about what makes a healthy relationship with peers
instruction: Inshuti yanjye impora ivuga ko inshuti zanjye z'abagore n'abapfakazi atari nziza. Ese uwo ni umubano mwiza?
output: Oya, ntabwo ari umubano mwiza. Umubano mwiza ushingira ku cyizere no kubahana. Inshuti yawe igomba kubaha amahitomo yawe ku nshuti zindi. Iyo umuntu ashaka kugukura ku bandi, bishobora kuba ikimenyetso cy'uko ashaka kugushyira ku gitutu. Ni ngombwa kugira inshuti nyinshi, ntabwo ugomba kuba wenyine.

scenario: A young girl feeling pressured by friends to do something she's uncomfortable with
instruction: Inshuti zanjye zimpamagarira gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge. Nakora iki ngo mvuge 'Oya' ntangiye kubyanga?
output: Kuvuga 'Oya' ku biyobyabwenge ni intambwe ikomeye yo kwirinda. Ushobora kuvuga uti, 'Oya, ntabwo nshaka kubikora, kandi ndakwinginze ubaze undi muntu.' Ntugomba gusobanura impamvu. Ushobora no kuvuga ko ufite ikindi kigomba gukora. Kwirinda ibiyobyabwenge ni ngombwa cyane ku buzima bwawe.

scenario: A young girl struggling with how she looks and comparing herself to others
instruction: Ndi gutekereza ko ibiro byanjye bikabije. Nshaka kumenya uko nakwita ku mubiri wanjye.
output: Agaciro kawe ntikagombye guhagarara ku biro byawe. Ni byiza ko wita ku mubiri wawe ukoresheje kurya neza no gukora imyitozo. Jya wandika ibyiza ukora buri munsi (ubwenge, umutima mwiza, impano). Kwizera ubwiza bwawe bizagufasha kwihangana. Niba ugomba gukemura ibibazo byawe by'ibiryo, jya uganira n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl asking how to stay safe when walking alone or in public places
instruction: Ndi gutinya umuntu uhora agenda inyuma yanjye mu muhanda. Nakora iki ngo ndekere kugira ubwoba?
output: Jya uhagarara, urebe inyuma, kandi uta kuri uwo muntu. Jya ugenda ahantu hari abandi bantu cyangwa se ugende vuba mu rugo rw'inshuti. Niba ugomba, jya witabaza cyangwa se uhamagara umuntu mukuru wizeye. Kwirinda ni byiza kuruta kwicuza.

scenario: A young girl asking how to know if someone's behavior towards her is wrong
instruction: Hari umuntu uhora ankoraho ku buryo ntarabona. Ese ibyo byaba ari ibyaha?
output: Yego. Iyo umuntu agukozaho agaseke atarabyemeye cyangwa se akakubangamira, ni ikimenyetso cy'uko ari imyitwarire mibi. Niba umuntu akora ikintu kigutera ubwoba, jya umusubiza uti 'Hagarara!' mu ijwi rirenga. Jya uganira n'umuntu mukuru wizeye.

scenario: A young girl asking how to say no when she feels uncomfortable
instruction: Nshaka kumenya uko navuga 'Oya' ku gitekerezo cy'umugenzi wanjye w'urukundo cyane, kandi ntagira ubwoba.
output: Ufite uburenganzira bwo kuvuga 'Oya' mu gihe utanezerewe cyangwa se ubonye ko hari ikibazo. Ushobora kuvuga uti: 'Oya, sinshaka kubikora,' cyangwa 'Oya, ndumva bitari byiza.' Kuvuga 'Oya' bisobanura ko hari imipaka uriho. Jya wihagararaho kandi wige kumenya ko agaciro kawe ari ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl asking who she can talk to if something bad happens
instruction: Nabonye ikibazo cy'umugenzi wanjye, ariko sinzi uwo nabibwira kugira ngo ndamure. Nshaka ubufasha.
output: Ni ngombwa cyane gushaka ubufasha vuba na bwangu. Jya uganira n'umuntu mukuru wizeye (umubyeyi, umuyobozi w'itorero, umujyanama w'ishuri). Ntuzigere ukomeza kwihisha ibyabaye. Ufite uburenganzira bwo kubaho mu mahoro.

scenario: A young girl asking about staying safe on the internet and social media
instruction: Hari umuntu untera ubwoba kuri interineti kandi ntazi. Nakora iki ngo mbihagarike?
output: Jya uhagarika (block) uwo muntu, kandi ubwire ababyeyi bawe cyangwa undi muntu mukuru wizeye ibyabaye. Ntuzigere uhangana na we ku murongo. Jya wita ku 'privacy settings' zawe kugira ngo wikize ibyago.

scenario: A young girl asking what personal information she should not share
instruction: Ese nshobora gutanga izina ry'umubyeyi wanjye kuri interineti kugira ngo ndamure?
output: Oya, ntugomba gutanga izina ry'umubyeyi wawe cyangwa se amakuru yawe bwite kuri interineti. Amakuru nk'ayo ashyira umuryango wawe mu kaga. Ntuzigere uhereza umuntu amakuru yawe bwite, nubwo mwaba mwaraziranye kuri interineti.

instruction: Hari umuhungu uhora antera ubwoba n'amagambo adakwiye. Nakora iki ngo ndekere kugira ubwoba?

instruction: Nshaka kumenya uburyo bwo gukemura ikibazo kiri mu rugo. Ahantu hizewe ni he nabiganiriraho?
output: Ahantu hizewe ni ahantu wumva uri wenyine, kandi abantu ntibaguteye ubwoba. Ushobora kujya ahantu hari umuyobozi w'itorero, umujyanama w'ishuri, cyangwa se urugo rwa mugenzi wawe wizeye. Kwita ku mutekano wawe ni ngombwa.

instruction: Inshuti zanjye zimpamagarira gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge. Nakora iki ngo mvuge 'Oya' ntangiye kubyanga?
output: Kuvuga 'Oya' ku biyobyabwenge ni intambwe ikomeye yo kwirinda. Ushobora kuvuga uti, 'Oya, ntabwo nshaka kubikora, kandi ndakwinginze ubaze undi muntu.' Ntugomba gusobanura impamvu. Ushobora no kuvuga ko ufite ikindi kigomba gukora. Kwirinda ibiyobyabwenge ni ngombwa cyane ku buzima bwawe.

scenario: A young girl struggling with how she looks and comparing herself to others
instruction: Ndi gutekereza ko ibiro byanjye bikabije. Nshaka kumenya uko nakwita ku mubiri wanjye.
output: Agaciro kawe ntikagombye guhagarara ku biro byawe. Ni byiza ko wita ku mubiri wawe ukoresheje kurya neza no gukora imyitozo. Jya wandika ibyiza ukora buri munsi (ubwenge, umutima mwiza, impano). Kwizera ubwiza bwawe bizagufasha kwihangana. Niba ugomba gukemura ibibazo byawe by'ibiryo, jya uganira n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl asking how to stay safe when walking alone or in public places
instruction: Ndi gutinya umuntu uhora agenda inyuma yanjye mu muhanda. Nakora iki ngo ndekere kugira ubwoba?
output: Jya uhagarara, urebe inyuma, kandi uta kuri uwo muntu. Jya ugenda ahantu hari abandi bantu cyangwa se ugende vuba mu rugo rw'inshuti. Niba ugomba, jya witabaza cyangwa se uhamagara umuntu mukuru wizeye. Kwirinda ni byiza kuruta kwicuza.

scenario: A young girl asking how to know if someone's behavior towards her is wrong
instruction: Hari umuntu uhora ankoraho ku buryo ntarabona. Ese ibyo byaba ari ibyaha?
output: Yego. Iyo umuntu agukozaho agaseke atarabyemeye cyangwa se akakubangamira, ni ikimenyetso cy'uko ari imyitwarire mibi. Niba umuntu akora ikintu kigutera ubwoba, jya umusubiza uti 'Hagarara!' mu ijwi rirenga. Jya uganira n'umuntu mukuru wizeye.

scenario: A young girl asking how to say no when she feels uncomfortable
instruction: Nshaka kumenya uko navuga 'Oya' ku gitekerezo cy'umugenzi wanjye w'urukundo cyane, kandi ntagira ubwoba.
output: Ufite uburenganzira bwo kuvuga 'Oya' mu gihe utanezerewe cyangwa se ubonye ko hari ikibazo. Ushobora kuvuga uti: 'Oya, sinshaka kubikora,' cyangwa 'Oya, ndumva bitari byiza.' Kuvuga 'Oya' bisobanura ko hari imipaka uriho. Jya wihagararaho kandi wige kumenya ko agaciro kawe ari ngombwa.
